Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm not exactly new to KSP, I've been playing for a few months now (just passed 200 hours!) but this is my first time here on this forum. I've spent most of my time on KSP making different variations of planes. As of right now, the only terrestrial bodies I've visited outside of Kerbal's SOI are Duna and Ike (twice for each).

Mods being used: B9, Extraplanetary Launchpads, Kerbal Alarm Clock, Kethane, (Infernal Robotics sometimes), NASA, SCANSat, Spaceplane+

I could actually use a little help when it comes to EL and Kethane... Can anyone point me in the right direction to creating a Mun or Minmus base for launching ships? And I'll probably need a bit of help designing a good ship/rover drill that can dock into that base. I've been doing a fair amount of trial...with a whole lot of error haha. My game tends to freeze between launch/tracking-station/hangar every once in a while which makes the trial-and-error process a bit more tedious...

Anyway, sorry for introducing myself with problems haha. I look forward to getting to know some of you and exploring the Kerbalverse with you all!
Welcome to the forums, we are glad to have you here! There is a lot of support for those mods in the addon forums, and if you like Kethane, you might want to check out Karbonite.

Anyway, sorry for introducing myself with problems haha. I look forward to getting to know some of you and exploring the Kerbalverse with you all!

no problem, i had questions when i joined,to

welcome to the forums!
